content:
I am planning a trip to Aargentina (domain: AR, locale: es_ar) and I am looking for a hotel to stay. Can you provide me with the details of the hotel?
Begin!
To proceed, I first need the specific hotel ID you are interested in so I can fetch the details for you from the hotels.com provider about your trip to Argentina.
